# MAVLink Common Message Set - Command Definitions (JSON Format)
# Auto-generated from common.xml
# Reference: https://mavlink.io/en/messages/common.html
#
# Commands are sent as JSON and converted to MAVLink by the Python protocol
# MAV_CMD_* entries are sent via COMMAND_LONG (ID 76)

# ============================================================================
# COMMAND_LONG (Generic) - Send any MAV_CMD with raw parameters
# Use this for commands not explicitly defined below
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> COMMAND_LONG BIG_ENDIAN "Send a MAVLink command with parameters"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":0,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 0 0 65535 "MAV_CMD command ID"
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT 16
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_RETURN_TO_LAUNCH 20
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_LAND 21
    STATE MAV_CMD_NAV_TAKEOFF 22
    STATE MAV_CMD_DO_SET_MODE 176
    STATE MAV_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM 400
    STATE MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE 512

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 1"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 2"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 3"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 4"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 5 (often Latitude)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 6 (often Longitude)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Parameter 7 (often Altitude)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_WAYPOINT (MAV_CMD 16)
# Navigate to waypoint. This is intended for use in missions (for guided
# commands outside of missions use MAV_CMD_DO_REPOSITION).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_WAYPOINT BIG_ENDIAN "Navigate to waypoint. This is intended for use in missions (for guided commands outside of missions use MAV_CMD_DO_REPOSITION)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":16,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 16 16 16 "MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER HOLD 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Hold time. (ignored by fixed wing, time to stay at waypoint for rotary wing)"
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCEPT_RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Acceptance radius (if the sphere with this radius is hit, the waypoint counts as reached)"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PASS_RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "0 to pass through the WP, if > 0 radius to pass by WP. Positive value for clockwise orbit, negative value for counter-clockwise orbit. Allows trajectory control."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired yaw angle at waypoint (rotary wing). NaN to use the current system yaw heading mode (e.g. yaw towards next waypoint, yaw to home, etc.)."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 18 18 18 "MAV_CMD_NAV_LOITER_TURNS"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TURNS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Number of turns."

  APPEND_PARAMETER HEADING_REQUIRED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Leave loiter circle only when track heads towards the next waypoint (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: Leave when turns complete). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter radius around waypoint for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopters). If positive loiter clockwise, else counter-clockwise"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER XTRACK_LOCATION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter circle exit location and/or path to next waypoint ('xtrack') for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopters). 0 for the vehicle to converge towards the center xtrack when it leaves the loiter (the line between the centers of the current and next waypoint), 1 to converge to the direct line between the location that the vehicle exits the loiter radius and the next waypoint. Otherwise the angle (in degrees) between the tangent of the loiter circle and the center xtrack at which the vehicle must leave the loiter (and converge to the center xtrack). NaN to use the current system default xtrack behaviour."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_LOITER_TIME (MAV_CMD 19)
# Loiter at the specified latitude, longitude and altitude for a certain
# amount of time. Multicopter vehicles stop at the point (within a
# vehicle-specific acceptance radius). Forward-only moving vehicles (e.g.
# fixed-wing) circle the point with the specified radius/direction. If the
# Heading Required parameter (2) is non-zero forward moving aircraft will
# only leave the loiter circle once heading towards the next waypoint.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_LOITER_TIME BIG_ENDIAN "Loiter at the specified latitude, longitude and altitude for a certain amount of time.   APPEND_PARAMETER TIME 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter time (only starts once Lat, Lon and Alt is reached)."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER HEADING_REQUIRED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Leave loiter circle only when track heading towards the next waypoint (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: Leave on time expiry). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter radius around waypoint for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopters). If positive loiter clockwise, else counter-clockwise."

Otherwise the angle (in degrees) between the tangent of the loiter circle and the center xtrack at which the vehicle must leave the loiter (and converge to the center xtrack). NaN to use the current system default xtrack behaviour."

# ============================================================================
# NAV_CONTINUE_AND_CHANGE_ALT (MAV_CMD 30)
# Continue on the current course and climb/descend to specified altitude. 
# When the altitude is reached continue to the next command (i.e., don't
# proceed to the next command until the desired altitude is reached.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_CONTINUE_AND_CHANGE_ALT BIG_ENDIAN "Continue on the current course and climb/descend to specified altitude. When the altitude is reached continue to the next command (i.e., don't proceed to the next command until the desired altitude is reached."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":30,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 30 30 30 "MAV_CMD_NAV_CONTINUE_AND_CHANGE_ALT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Climb or Descend (0 = Neutral, command completes when within 5m of this command's altitude, 1 = Climbing, command completes when at or above this command's altitude, 2 = Descending, command completes when at or below this command's altitude."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT (MAV_CMD 31)
# Begin loiter at the specified Latitude and Longitude.  If Lat=Lon=0, then
# loiter at the current position.  Don't consider the navigation command
# complete (don't leave loiter) until the altitude has been reached.
# Additionally, if the Heading Required parameter is non-zero the aircraft
# will not leave the loiter until heading toward the next waypoint.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT BIG_ENDIAN "Begin loiter at the specified Latitude and Longitude. If Lat=Lon=0, then loiter at the current position. Don't consider the navigation command complete (don't leave loiter) until the altitude has been reached. Additionally, if the Heading Required parameter is non-zero the aircraft will not leave the loiter until heading toward the next waypoint."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":31,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31 31 31 "MAV_CMD_NAV_LOITER_TO_ALT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER HEADING_REQUIRED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Leave loiter circle only when track heading towards the next waypoint (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: Leave when altitude reached). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter radius around waypoint for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopters). If positive loiter clockwise, negative counter-clockwise, 0 means no change to standard loiter."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER XTRACK_LOCATION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Loiter circle exit location and/or path to next waypoint ('xtrack') for forward-only moving vehicles (not multicopters). 0 for the vehicle to converge towards the center xtrack when it leaves the loiter (the line between the centers of the current and next waypoint), 1 to converge to the direct line between the location that the vehicle exits the loiter radius and the next waypoint. Otherwise the angle (in degrees) between the tangent of the loiter circle and the center xtrack at which the vehicle must leave the loiter (and converge to the center xtrack). NaN to use the current system default xtrack behaviour."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FOLLOW (MAV_CMD 32)
# Begin following a target
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FOLLOW BIG_ENDIAN "Begin following a target"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":32,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 32 32 32 "MAV_CMD_DO_FOLLOW"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSTEM_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "System ID (of the FOLLOW_TARGET beacon). Send 0 to disable follow-me and return to the default position hold mode."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude mode: 0: Keep current altitude, 1: keep altitude difference to target, 2: go to a fixed altitude above home."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude above home. (used if mode=2)"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TIME_TO_LAND 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Time to land in which the MAV should go to the default position hold mode after a message RX timeout."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_ORBIT (MAV_CMD 34)
# Start orbiting on the circumference of a circle defined by the parameters.
# Setting values to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) results in using
# defaults.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ORBIT BIG_ENDIAN "Start orbiting on the circumference of a circle defined by the parameters. Setting values to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) results in using defaults."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":34,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 34 34 34 "MAV_CMD_DO_ORBIT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Radius of the circle. Positive: orbit clockwise. Negative: orbit counter-clockwise. NaN: Use vehicle default radius, or current radius if already orbiting."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER VELOCITY 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Tangential Velocity. NaN: Use vehicle default velocity, or current velocity if already orbiting."
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_BEHAVIOR 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw behavior of the vehicle."
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_FRONT_TO_CIRCLE_CENTER 0
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_INITIAL_HEADING 1
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_UNCONTROLLED 2
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_HOLD_FRONT_TANGENT_TO_CIRCLE 3
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_RC_CONTROLLED 4
    STATE ORBIT_YAW_BEHAVIOUR_UNCHANGED 5

  APPEND_PARAMETER ORBITS 32 FLOAT 0 MIN MAX "Orbit around the centre point for this many radians (i.e. for a three-quarter orbit set 270*Pi/180). 0: Orbit forever. NaN: Use vehicle default, or current value if already orbiting."
    UNITS "Radians" rad

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point latitude (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / X coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. INT32_MAX (or NaN if sent in COMMAND_LONG): Use current vehicle position, or current center if already orbiting."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point longitude (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / Y coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. INT32_MAX (or NaN if sent in COMMAND_LONG): Use current vehicle position, or current center if already orbiting."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point altitude (MSL) (if no MAV_FRAME specified) / Z coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. NaN: Use current vehicle altitude."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FIGURE_EIGHT (MAV_CMD 35)
# Fly a figure eight path as defined by the parameters.
# Set parameters to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) to use system-default
# values.
# The command is intended for fixed wing vehicles (and VTOL hybrids flying
# in fixed-wing mode), allowing POI tracking for gimbals that don't support
# infinite rotation.
# This command only defines the flight path. Speed should be set
# independently (use e.g. MAV_CMD_DO_CHANGE_SPEED).
# Yaw and other degrees of freedom are not specified, and will be
# flight-stack specific (on vehicles where they can be controlled
# independent of the heading).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FIGURE_EIGHT BIG_ENDIAN "Fly a figure eight path as defined by the parameters. Set parameters to NaN/INT32_MAX (as appropriate) to use system-default values. The command is intended for fixed wing vehicles (and VTOL hybrids flying in fixed-wing mode), allowing POI tracking for gimbals that don't support infinite rotation. This command only defines the flight path. Speed should be set independently (use e.g. MAV_CMD_DO_CHANGE_SPEED). Yaw and other degrees of freedom are not specified, and will be flight-stack specific (on vehicles where they can be controlled independent of the heading)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":35,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 35 35 35 "MAV_CMD_DO_FIGURE_EIGHT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MAJOR_RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Major axis radius of the figure eight. Positive: orbit the north circle clockwise. Negative: orbit the north circle counter-clockwise. NaN: The radius will be set to 2.5 times the minor radius and direction is clockwise. Must be greater or equal to two times the minor radius for feasible values."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER MINOR_RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Minor axis radius of the figure eight. Defines the radius of the two circles that make up the figure. Negative value has no effect. NaN: The radius will be set to the default loiter radius."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER ORIENTATION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Orientation of the figure eight major axis with respect to true north (range: [-pi,pi]). NaN: use default orientation aligned to true north."
    UNITS "Radians" rad

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point latitude/X coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAME specified, MAV_FRAME_GLOBAL is assumed. INT32_MAX or NaN: Use current vehicle position, or current center if already loitering."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point longitude/Y coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAME specified, MAV_FRAME_GLOBAL is assumed. INT32_MAX or NaN: Use current vehicle position, or current center if already loitering."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Center point altitude MSL/Z coordinate according to MAV_FRAME. If no MAV_FRAME specified, MAV_FRAME_GLOBAL is assumed. INT32_MAX or NaN: Use current vehicle altitude."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_ROI (MAV_CMD 80)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself.
# This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the
# vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_ROI BIG_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) for a sensor set or the vehicle itself. This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":80,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 80 80 80 "MAV_CMD_NAV_ROI"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Region of interest mode."
    STATE MAV_ROI_NONE 0
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPNEXT 1
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPINDEX 2
    STATE MAV_ROI_LOCATION 3
    STATE MAV_ROI_TARGET 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER WP_INDEX 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Waypoint index/ target ID. (see MAV_ROI enum)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_INDEX 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "ROI index (allows a vehicle to manage multiple ROI's)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "x the location of the fixed ROI (see MAV_FRAME)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "y"

  APPEND_PARAMETER Z 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "z"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LOCAL_CTRL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "0: Disable local obstacle avoidance / local path planning (without resetting map), 1: Enable local path planning, 2: Enable and reset local path planning"

  APPEND_PARAMETER GLOBAL_CTRL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "0: Disable full path planning (without resetting map), 1: Enable, 2: Enable and reset map/occupancy grid, 3: Enable and reset planned route, but not occupancy grid"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw angle at goal"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude/Y of goal"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude/Z of goal"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_VTOL_TAKEOFF (MAV_CMD 84)
# Takeoff from ground using VTOL mode, and transition to forward flight with
# specified heading. The command should be ignored by vehicles that dont
# support both VTOL and fixed-wing flight (multicopters, boats,etc.).
# ============================================================================

  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":84,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 84 84 84 "MAV_CMD_NAV_VTOL_TAKEOFF"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_NEXT_WAYPOINT 1
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_TAKEOFF 2
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_SPECIFIED 3
    STATE VTOL_TRANSITION_HEADING_ANY 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw angle. NaN to use the current system yaw heading mode (e.g. yaw towards next waypoint, yaw to home, etc.)."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_DELAY (MAV_CMD 93)
# Delay the next navigation command a number of seconds or until a specified
# time
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_DELAY BIG_ENDIAN "Delay the next navigation command a number of seconds or until a specified time"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":93,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 93 93 93 "MAV_CMD_NAV_DELAY"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER DELAY 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Delay (-1 to enable time-of-day fields)"
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER HOUR 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "hour (24h format, UTC, -1 to ignore)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MINUTE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "minute (24h format, UTC, -1 to ignore)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER SECOND 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "second (24h format, UTC, -1 to ignore)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE (MAV_CMD 94)
# Descend and place payload. Vehicle moves to specified location, descends
# until it detects a hanging payload has reached the ground, and then
# releases the payload. If ground is not detected before the reaching the
# maximum descent value (param1), the command will complete without
# releasing the payload.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE BIG_ENDIAN "Descend and place payload. Vehicle moves to specified location, descends until it detects a hanging payload has reached the ground, and then releases the payload. If ground is not detected before the reaching the maximum descent value (param1), the command will complete without releasing the payload."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":94,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 94 94 94 "MAV_CMD_NAV_PAYLOAD_PLACE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MAX_DESCENT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Maximum distance to descend."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    STATE SPEED_TYPE_CLIMB_SPEED 2

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_HOME (MAV_CMD 179)
# Sets the home position to either to the current position or a specified
# position.
# The home position is the default position that the system will return to
# and land on.
# The position is set automatically by the system during the takeoff (and
# may also be set using this command).
# Note: the current home position may be emitted in a HOME_POSITION message
# on request (using MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE with param1=242).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_HOME BIG_ENDIAN "Sets the home position to either to the current position or a specified position. The home position is the default position that the system will return to and land on. The position is set automatically by the system during the takeoff (and may also be set using this command). Note: the current home position may be emitted in a HOME_POSITION message on request (using MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE with param1=242)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":179,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 179 179 179 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_HOME"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER USE_CURRENT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Use current location (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: use specified location). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Roll angle (of surface). Range: -180..180 degrees. NAN or 0 means value not set. 0.01 indicates zero roll."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pitch angle (of surface). Range: -90..90 degrees. NAN or 0 means value not set. 0.01 means zero pitch."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw angle. NaN to use default heading. Range: -180..180 degrees."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# Set a servo to a desired PWM value.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_SERVO BIG_ENDIAN "Set a servo to a desired PWM value."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":183,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 183 183 183 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_SERVO"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Servo instance number."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PWM 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pulse Width Modulation."
    UNITS "Microseconds" us

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_REPEAT_SERVO (MAV_CMD 184)

# of cycles with a desired period.

  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":184,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION (MAV_CMD 185)
# Terminate flight immediately.
# Flight termination immediately and irreversibly terminates the current
# flight, returning the vehicle to ground.
# The vehicle will ignore RC or other input until it has been power-cycled.
# Termination may trigger safety measures, including: disabling motors and
# deployment of parachute on multicopters, and setting flight surfaces to
# initiate a landing pattern on fixed-wing).
# On multicopters without a parachute it may trigger a crash landing.
# Support for this command can be tested using the protocol bit:
# MAV_PROTOCOL_CAPABILITY_FLIGHT_TERMINATION.
# Support for this command can also be tested by sending the command with
# param1=0 (< 0.5); the ACK should be either MAV_RESULT_FAILED or
# MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION BIG_ENDIAN "Terminate flight immediately. Flight termination immediately and irreversibly terminates the current flight, returning the vehicle to ground. The vehicle will ignore RC or other input until it has been power-cycled. Termination may trigger safety measures, including: disabling motors and deployment of parachute on multicopters, and setting flight surfaces to initiate a landing pattern on fixed-wing). On multicopters without a parachute it may trigger a crash landing. Support for this command can be tested using the protocol bit: MAV_PROTOCOL_CAPABILITY_FLIGHT_TERMINATION. Support for this command can also be tested by sending the command with param1=0 (< 0.5); the ACK should be either MAV_RESULT_FAILED or MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":185,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 185 185 185 "MAV_CMD_DO_FLIGHTTERMINATION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TERMINATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Flight termination activated if > 0.5. Otherwise not activated and ACK with MAV_RESULT_FAILED."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will terminate flight immediately!"

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ACTUATOR (MAV_CMD 187)
# Sets actuators (e.g. servos) to a desired value. The actuator numbers are
# mapped to specific outputs (e.g. on any MAIN or AUX PWM or UAVCAN) using a
# flight-stack specific mechanism (i.e. a parameter).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ACTUATOR BIG_ENDIAN "Sets actuators (e.g. servos) to a desired value. The actuator numbers are mapped to specific outputs (e.g. on any MAIN or AUX PWM or UAVCAN) using a flight-stack specific mechanism (i.e. a parameter)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":187,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 187 187 187 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ACTUATOR"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 1 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 2 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 3 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 4 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 5 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator 6 value, scaled from [-1 to 1]. NaN to ignore."

  APPEND_PARAMETER INDEX 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Index of actuator set (i.e if set to 1, Actuator 1 becomes Actuator 7)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# DO_RETURN_PATH_START (MAV_CMD 188)
# Mission item to specify the start of a failsafe/landing return-path
# segment (the end of the segment is the next MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START item).
# A vehicle that is using missions for landing (e.g. in a return mode) will
# join the mission on the closest path of the return-path segment (instead
# of MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START or the nearest waypoint).
# The main use case is to minimize the failsafe flight path in corridor
# missions, where the inbound/outbound paths are constrained (by geofences)
# to the same particular path.
# The MAV_CMD_NAV_RETURN_PATH_START would be placed at the start of the
# return path.
# If a failsafe occurs on the outbound path the vehicle will move to the
# nearest point on the return path (which is parallel for this kind of
# mission), effectively turning round and following the shortest path to
# landing.
# If a failsafe occurs on the inbound path the vehicle is already on the
# return segment and will continue to landing.
# The Latitude/Longitude/Altitude are optional, and may be set to 0 if not
# needed.
# If specified, the item defines the waypoint at which the return segment
# starts.
# If sent using as a command, the vehicle will perform a mission landing
# (using the land segment if defined) or reject the command if mission
# landings are not supported, or no mission landing is defined. When used as
# a command any position information in the command is ignored.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_RETURN_PATH_START BIG_ENDIAN "Mission item to specify the start of a failsafe/landing return-path segment (the end of the segment is the next MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START item). A vehicle that is using missions for landing (e.g. in a return mode) will join the mission on the closest path of the return-path segment (instead of MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START or the nearest waypoint). The main use case is to minimize the failsafe flight path in corridor missions, where the inbound/outbound paths are constrained (by geofences) to the same particular path. The MAV_CMD_NAV_RETURN_PATH_START would be placed at the start of the return path. If a failsafe occurs on the outbound path the vehicle will move to the nearest point on the return path (which is parallel for this kind of mission), effectively turning round and following the shortest path to landing. If a failsafe occurs on the inbound path the vehicle is already on the return segment and will continue to landing. The Latitude/Longitude/Altitude are optional, and may be set to 0 if not needed. If specified, the item defines the waypoint at which the return segment starts. If sent using as a command, the vehicle will perform a mission landing (using the land segment if defined) or reject the command if mission landings are not supported, or no mission landing is defined. When used as a command any position information in the command is ignored."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":188,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 188 188 188 "MAV_CMD_DO_RETURN_PATH_START"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitudee. 0: not used."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitudee. 0: not used."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitudee. 0: not used."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_LAND_START (MAV_CMD 189)
# Mission item to mark the start of a mission landing pattern, or a command
# to land with a mission landing pattern.
# When used in a mission, this is a marker for the start of a sequence of
# mission items that represent a landing pattern.
# It should be followed by a navigation item that defines the first waypoint
# of the landing sequence.
# The start marker positional params are used only for selecting what
# landing pattern to use if several are defined in the mission (the selected
# pattern will be the one with the marker position that is closest to the
# vehicle when a landing is commanded).
# If the marker item position has zero-values for latitude, longitude, and
# altitude, then landing pattern selection is instead based on the position
# of the first waypoint in the landing sequence.
# When sent as a command it triggers a landing using a mission landing
# pattern.
# The location parameters are not used in this case, and should be set to 0.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_LAND_START BIG_ENDIAN "Mission item to mark the start of a mission landing pattern, or a command to land with a mission landing pattern. When used in a mission, this is a marker for the start of a sequence of mission items that represent a landing pattern. It should be followed by a navigation item that defines the first waypoint of the landing sequence. The start marker positional params are used only for selecting what landing pattern to use if several are defined in the mission (the selected pattern will be the one with the marker position that is closest to the vehicle when a landing is commanded). If the marker item position has zero-values for latitude, longitude, and altitude, then landing pattern selection is instead based on the position of the first waypoint in the landing sequence. When sent as a command it triggers a landing using a mission landing pattern. The location parameters are not used in this case, and should be set to 0."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":189,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 189 189 189 "MAV_CMD_DO_LAND_START"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in commands (set 0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in commands (set 0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude for landing sequence selection, or 0 (see description). Ignored in commands (set 0)."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    UNITS "Radians" rad

    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION (MAV_CMD 195)
# Sets the region of interest (ROI) to a location. This can then be used by
# the vehicle's control system to control the vehicle attitude and the
# attitude of various sensors such as cameras. This command can be sent to a
# gimbal manager but not to a gimbal device. A gimbal is not to react to
# this message.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION BIG_ENDIAN "Sets the region of interest (ROI) to a location. This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras. This command can be sent to a gimbal manager but not to a gimbal device. A gimbal is not to react to this message."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":195,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 195 195 195 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI_LOCATION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 for all gimbal device components. Send command multiple times for more than one gimbal (but not all gimbals)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude of ROI location"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# DO_SET_ROI_WPNEXT_OFFSET (MAV_CMD 196)

# control system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various

# not to a gimbal device. A gimbal device is not to react to this message.

  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":196,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_OFFSET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pitch offset from next waypoint, positive pitching up"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_OFFSET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Roll offset from next waypoint, positive rolling to the right"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_OFFSET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw offset from next waypoint, positive yawing to the right"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_ROI_NONE (MAV_CMD 197)
# Cancels any previous ROI command returning the vehicle/sensors to default
# flight characteristics. This can then be used by the vehicle's control
# system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors
# such as cameras. This command can be sent to a gimbal manager but not to a
# gimbal device. A gimbal device is not to react to this message. After this
# command the gimbal manager should go back to manual input if available,
# and otherwise assume a neutral position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_ROI_NONE BIG_ENDIAN "Cancels any previous ROI command returning the vehicle/sensors to default flight characteristics. This can then be used by the vehicle's control system to control the vehicle attitude and the attitude of various sensors such as cameras. This command can be sent to a gimbal manager but not to a gimbal device. A gimbal device is not to react to this message. After this command the gimbal manager should go back to manual input if available, and otherwise assume a neutral position."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":197,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 197 197 197 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_ROI_NONE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 for all gimbal device components. Send command multiple times for more than one gimbal (but not all gimbals)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

    STATE MAV_ROI_WPNEXT 1
    STATE MAV_ROI_WPINDEX 2
    STATE MAV_ROI_LOCATION 3
    STATE MAV_ROI_TARGET 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROI_INDEX 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Region of interest index. (allows a vehicle to manage multiple ROI's)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "MAV_ROI_WPNEXT: yaw offset from next waypoint, MAV_ROI_LOCATION: altitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER STABILIZE_YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Stabilize yaw (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Roll input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pitch input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_INPUT_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw input (0 = angle body frame, 1 = angular rate, 2 = angle absolute frame)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST (MAV_CMD 206)
# Mission command to set camera trigger distance for this flight. The camera
# is triggered each time this distance is exceeded. This command can also be
# used to set the shutter integration time for the camera.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST BIG_ENDIAN "Mission command to set camera trigger distance for this flight. The camera is triggered each time this distance is exceeded. This command can also be used to set the shutter integration time for the camera."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 206 206 206 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_CAM_TRIGG_DIST"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER DISTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Camera trigger distance. 0 to stop triggering."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Camera shutter integration time. -1 or 0 to ignore"
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms

  APPEND_PARAMETER TRIGGER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Trigger camera once, immediately (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_FENCE_ENABLE (MAV_CMD 207)
# Enable the geofence.
# This can be used in a mission or via the command protocol.
# The persistence/lifetime of the setting is undefined.
# Depending on flight stack implementation it may persist until superseded,
# or it may revert to a system default at the end of a mission.
# Flight stacks typically reset the setting to system defaults on reboot.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_FENCE_ENABLE BIG_ENDIAN "Enable the geofence. This can be used in a mission or via the command protocol. The persistence/lifetime of the setting is undefined. Depending on flight stack implementation it may persist until superseded, or it may revert to a system default at the end of a mission. Flight stacks typically reset the setting to system defaults on reboot."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":207,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 207 207 207 "MAV_CMD_DO_FENCE_ENABLE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "enable? (0=disable, 1=enable, 2=disable_floor_only)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TYPES 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Fence types to enable or disable as a bitmask. 0: field is unused/all fences should be enabled or disabled (for compatibility reasons). Parameter is ignored if param1=2."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_PARACHUTE (MAV_CMD 208)
# Mission item/command to release a parachute or enable/disable auto
# release.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_PARACHUTE BIG_ENDIAN "Mission item/command to release a parachute or enable/disable auto release."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":208,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 208 208 208 "MAV_CMD_DO_PARACHUTE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action"
    STATE PARACHUTE_DISABLE 0
    STATE PARACHUTE_ENABLE 1
    STATE PARACHUTE_RELEASE 2

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will deploy the parachute!"

  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":209,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 209 209 209 "MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Motor instance number (from 1 to max number of motors on the vehicle)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER THROTTLE_TYPE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Throttle type (whether the Throttle Value in param3 is a percentage, PWM value, etc.)"
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PERCENT 0
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PWM 1
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_THROTTLE_PILOT 2
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_COMPASS_CAL 3

  APPEND_PARAMETER THROTTLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Throttle value."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TIMEOUT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Timeout between tests that are run in sequence."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER MOTOR_COUNT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Motor count. Number of motors to test in sequence: 0/1=one motor, 2= two motors, etc. The Timeout (param4) is used between tests."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TEST_ORDER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Motor test order."
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_DEFAULT 0
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_SEQUENCE 1
    STATE MOTOR_TEST_ORDER_BOARD 2

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms

# DO_GUIDED_LIMITS (MAV_CMD 222)
# Set limits for external control
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_GUIDED_LIMITS BIG_ENDIAN "Set limits for external control"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":222,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 222 222 222 "MAV_CMD_DO_GUIDED_LIMITS"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TIMEOUT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Timeout - maximum time that external controller will be allowed to control vehicle. 0 means no timeout."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER MIN_ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude (MSL) min - if vehicle moves below this alt, the command will be aborted and the mission will continue. 0 means no lower altitude limit."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER MAX_ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude (MSL) max - if vehicle moves above this alt, the command will be aborted and the mission will continue. 0 means no upper altitude limit."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER HORIZ_MOVE_LIMIT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Horizontal move limit - if vehicle moves more than this distance from its location at the moment the command was executed, the command will be aborted and the mission will continue. 0 means no horizontal move limit."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_ENGINE_CONTROL (MAV_CMD 223)
# Control vehicle engine. This is interpreted by the vehicles engine
# controller to change the target engine state. It is intended for vehicles
# with internal combustion engines
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ENGINE_CONTROL BIG_ENDIAN "Control vehicle engine. This is interpreted by the vehicles engine controller to change the target engine state. It is intended for vehicles with internal combustion engines"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":223,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 223 223 223 "MAV_CMD_DO_ENGINE_CONTROL"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER START_ENGINE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Start engine (MAV_BOOL_False: Stop engine). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER COLD_START 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Cold start engine (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: Warm start). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid. Controls use of choke where applicable"

  APPEND_PARAMETER HEIGHT_DELAY 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Height delay. This is for commanding engine start only after the vehicle has gained the specified height. Used in VTOL vehicles during takeoff to start engine after the aircraft is off the ground. Zero for no delay."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER OPTIONS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "A bitmask of options for engine control"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT (MAV_CMD 224)
# Set the mission item with sequence number seq as the current item and emit
# MISSION_CURRENT (whether or not the mission number changed).
# If a mission is currently being executed, the system will continue to this
# new mission item on the shortest path, skipping any intermediate mission
# items.
# Note that mission jump repeat counters are not reset unless param2 is set
# (see MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP param2).
# This command may trigger a mission state-machine change on some systems:
# for example from MISSION_STATE_NOT_STARTED or MISSION_STATE_PAUSED to
# MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE.
# If the system is in mission mode, on those systems this command might
# therefore start, restart or resume the mission.
# If the system is not in mission mode this command must not trigger a
# switch to mission mode.
# The mission may be "reset" using param2.
# Resetting sets jump counters to initial values (to reset counters without
# changing the current mission item set the param1 to `-1`).
# Resetting also explicitly changes a mission state of
# MISSION_STATE_COMPLETE to MISSION_STATE_PAUSED or MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE,
# potentially allowing it to resume when it is (next) in a mission mode.
# The command will ACK with MAV_RESULT_FAILED if the sequence number is out
# of range (including if there is no mission item).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT BIG_ENDIAN "Set the mission item with sequence number seq as the current item and emit MISSION_CURRENT (whether or not the mission number changed). If a mission is currently being executed, the system will continue to this new mission item on the shortest path, skipping any intermediate mission items. Note that mission jump repeat counters are not reset unless param2 is set (see MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP param2). This command may trigger a mission state-machine change on some systems: for example from MISSION_STATE_NOT_STARTED or MISSION_STATE_PAUSED to MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE. If the system is in mission mode, on those systems this command might therefore start, restart or resume the mission. If the system is not in mission mode this command must not trigger a switch to mission mode. The mission may be 'reset' using param2. Resetting sets jump counters to initial values (to reset counters without changing the current mission item set the param1 to `-1`). Resetting also explicitly changes a mission state of MISSION_STATE_COMPLETE to MISSION_STATE_PAUSED or MISSION_STATE_ACTIVE, potentially allowing it to resume when it is (next) in a mission mode. The command will ACK with MAV_RESULT_FAILED if the sequence number is out of range (including if there is no mission item)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":224,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 224 224 224 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_MISSION_CURRENT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER NUMBER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Mission sequence value to set. -1 for the current mission item (use to reset mission without changing current mission item)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RESET_MISSION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reset mission (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid. Resets jump counters to initial values and changes mission state 'completed' to be 'active' or 'paused'."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_LAST (MAV_CMD 240)
# NOP - This command is only used to mark the upper limit of the DO commands
# in the enumeration
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_LAST BIG_ENDIAN "NOP - This command is only used to mark the upper limit of the DO commands in the enumeration"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":240,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 240 240 240 "MAV_CMD_DO_LAST"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION (MAV_CMD 241)
# Trigger calibration. This command will be only accepted if in pre-flight
# mode. Except for Temperature Calibration, only one sensor should be set in
# a single message and all others should be zero.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION BIG_ENDIAN "Trigger calibration. This command will be only accepted if in pre-flight mode. Except for Temperature Calibration, only one sensor should be set in a single message and all others should be zero."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":241,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 241 241 241 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_CALIBRATION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER GYRO_TEMPERATURE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: gyro calibration, 3: gyro temperature calibration"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MAGNETOMETER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Magnetometer calibration. Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER GROUND_PRESSURE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Ground pressure calibration. Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REMOTE_CONTROL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: radio RC calibration, 2: RC trim calibration"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCELEROMETER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: accelerometer calibration, 2: board level calibration, 3: accelerometer temperature calibration, 4: simple accelerometer calibration"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPMOT_OR_AIRSPEED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: APM: compass/motor interference calibration (PX4: airspeed calibration, deprecated), 2: airspeed calibration"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ESC_OR_BARO 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: ESC calibration, 3: barometer temperature calibration"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER X_OFFSET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "X axis offset (or generic dimension 1), in the sensor's raw units"

  APPEND_PARAMETER 6TH_DIMENSION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Generic dimension 6, in the sensor's raw units"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN (MAV_CMD 243)
# Trigger UAVCAN configuration (actuator ID assignment and direction
# mapping). Note that this maps to the legacy UAVCAN v0 function
# UAVCAN_ENUMERATE, which is intended to be executed just once during
# initial vehicle configuration (it is not a normal pre-flight command and
# has been poorly named).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN BIG_ENDIAN "Trigger UAVCAN configuration (actuator ID assignment and direction mapping). Note that this maps to the legacy UAVCAN v0 function UAVCAN_ENUMERATE, which is intended to be executed just once during initial vehicle configuration (it is not a normal pre-flight command and has been poorly named)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":243,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 243 243 243 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_UAVCAN"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTUATOR_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1: Trigger actuator ID assignment and direction mapping. 0: Cancel command."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

    STATE PARAM_READ_PERSISTENT 0
    STATE PARAM_WRITE_PERSISTENT 1
    STATE PARAM_RESET_CONFIG_DEFAULT 2
    STATE PARAM_RESET_SENSOR_DEFAULT 3
    STATE PARAM_RESET_ALL_DEFAULT 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER MISSION_STORAGE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action to perform on the persistent mission storage"
    STATE MISSION_READ_PERSISTENT 0
    STATE MISSION_WRITE_PERSISTENT 1
    STATE MISSION_RESET_DEFAULT 2

  APPEND_PARAMETER LOGGING_RATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Onboard logging: 0: Ignore, 1: Start default rate logging, -1: Stop logging, > 1: logging rate (e.g. set to 1000 for 1000 Hz logging)"
    UNITS "Hertz" Hz

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

# ============================================================================
# PREFLIGHT_REBOOT_SHUTDOWN (MAV_CMD 246)
# Request the reboot or shutdown of system components.
