  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":246,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 246 246 246 "MAV_CMD_PREFLIGHT_REBOOT_SHUTDOWN"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER AUTOPILOT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action to take for autopilot."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPANION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action to take for onboard computer."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPONENT_ACTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action to take for component specified in param4."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_NONE 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT 1
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_SHUTDOWN 2
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_REBOOT_TO_BOOTLOADER 3
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_ACTION_POWER_ON 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPONENT_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "MAVLink Component ID targeted in param3 (0 for all components)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONDITIONS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Conditions under which reboot/shutdown is allowed."
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_CONDITIONS_SAFETY_INTERLOCKED 0
    STATE REBOOT_SHUTDOWN_CONDITIONS_FORCE 20190226

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "WIP: ID (e.g. camera ID -1 for all IDs)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This will reboot or shutdown the system!"

# ============================================================================
# OVERRIDE_GOTO (MAV_CMD 252)
# Override current mission with command to pause mission, pause mission and
# move to position, continue/resume mission. When param 1 indicates that the
# mission is paused (MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD), param 2 defines whether it holds in
# place or moves to another position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> OVERRIDE_GOTO BIG_ENDIAN "Override current mission with command to pause mission, pause mission and move to position, continue/resume mission. When param 1 indicates that the mission is paused (MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD), param 2 defines whether it holds in place or moves to another position."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":252,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 252 252 252 "MAV_CMD_OVERRIDE_GOTO"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONTINUE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD: pause mission and either hold or move to specified position (depending on param2), MAV_GOTO_DO_CONTINUE: resume mission."
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD 0
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_CONTINUE 1
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION 2
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_SPECIFIED_POSITION 3

  APPEND_PARAMETER POSITION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION: hold at current position, MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_SPECIFIED_POSITION: hold at specified position."
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_HOLD 0
    STATE MAV_GOTO_DO_CONTINUE 1
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_CURRENT_POSITION 2
    STATE MAV_GOTO_HOLD_AT_SPECIFIED_POSITION 3

  APPEND_PARAMETER FRAME 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Coordinate frame of hold point."

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired yaw angle."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude/X position."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude/Y position."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_Z 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude/Z position."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# OBLIQUE_SURVEY (MAV_CMD 260)
# Mission command to set a Camera Auto Mount Pivoting Oblique Survey
# (Replaces CAM_TRIGG_DIST for this purpose). The camera is triggered each
# time this distance is exceeded, then the mount moves to the next position.
# Params 4~6 set-up the angle limits and number of positions for oblique
# survey, where mount-enabled vehicles automatically roll the camera between
# shots to emulate an oblique camera setup (providing an increased HFOV).
# This command can also be used to set the shutter integration time for the
# camera.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> OBLIQUE_SURVEY BIG_ENDIAN "Mission command to set a Camera Auto Mount Pivoting Oblique Survey (Replaces CAM_TRIGG_DIST for this purpose). The camera is triggered each time this distance is exceeded, then the mount moves to the next position. Params 4~6 set-up the angle limits and number of positions for oblique survey, where mount-enabled vehicles automatically roll the camera between shots to emulate an oblique camera setup (providing an increased HFOV). This command can also be used to set the shutter integration time for the camera."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":260,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 260 260 260 "MAV_CMD_OBLIQUE_SURVEY"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER DISTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Camera trigger distance. 0 to stop triggering."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER SHUTTER 32 FLOAT 0 MIN MAX "Camera shutter integration time. 0 to ignore"
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms

  APPEND_PARAMETER MIN_INTERVAL 32 FLOAT 0 MIN MAX "The minimum interval in which the camera is capable of taking subsequent pictures repeatedly. 0 to ignore."
    UNITS "Milliseconds" ms

  APPEND_PARAMETER POSITIONS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Total number of roll positions at which the camera will capture photos (images captures spread evenly across the limits defined by param5)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ROLL_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0 MIN MAX "Angle limits that the camera can be rolled to left and right of center."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0 MIN MAX "Fixed pitch angle that the camera will hold in oblique mode if the mount is actuated in the pitch axis."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE (MAV_CMD 262)
# Enable the specified standard MAVLink mode.
# If the specified mode is not supported, the vehicle should ACK with
# MAV_RESULT_FAILED.
# See https://mavlink.io/en/services/standard_modes.html
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE BIG_ENDIAN "Enable the specified standard MAVLink mode. If the specified mode is not supported, the vehicle should ACK with MAV_RESULT_FAILED. See https://mavlink.io/en/services/standard_modes.html"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":262,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 262 262 262 "MAV_CMD_DO_SET_STANDARD_MODE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER STANDARD_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The mode to set."
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_NON_STANDARD 0
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_POSITION_HOLD 1
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_ORBIT 2
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_CRUISE 3
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_ALTITUDE_HOLD 4
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_SAFE_RECOVERY 5
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_MISSION 6
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_LAND 7
    STATE MAV_STANDARD_MODE_TAKEOFF 8

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":300,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 300 300 300 "MAV_CMD_MISSION_START"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER FIRST_ITEM 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "first_item: the first mission item to run"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LAST_ITEM 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "last_item: the last mission item to run (after this item is run, the mission ends)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "This command may cause vehicle movement!"

# ============================================================================
# ACTUATOR_TEST (MAV_CMD 310)
# Actuator testing command. This is similar to MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST but
# operates on the level of output functions, i.e. it is possible to test
# Motor1 independent from which output it is configured on. Autopilots must
# NACK this command with MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED while armed.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ACTUATOR_TEST BIG_ENDIAN "Actuator testing command. This is similar to MAV_CMD_DO_MOTOR_TEST but operates on the level of output functions, i.e. it is possible to test Motor1 independent from which output it is configured on. Autopilots must NACK this command with MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED while armed."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":310,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 310 310 310 "MAV_CMD_ACTUATOR_TEST"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER VALUE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Output value: 1 means maximum positive output, 0 to center servos or minimum motor thrust (expected to spin), -1 for maximum negative (if not supported by the motors, i.e. motor is not reversible, smaller than 0 maps to NaN). And NaN maps to disarmed (stop the motors)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TIMEOUT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Timeout after which the test command expires and the output is restored to the previous value. A timeout has to be set for safety reasons. A timeout of 0 means to restore the previous value immediately."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER OUTPUT_FUNCTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator Output function"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CONFIGURE_ACTUATOR (MAV_CMD 311)
# Actuator configuration command.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CONFIGURE_ACTUATOR BIG_ENDIAN "Actuator configuration command."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":311,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 311 311 311 "MAV_CMD_CONFIGURE_ACTUATOR"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIGURATION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator configuration action"
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_NONE 0
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_BEEP 1
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_3D_MODE_ON 2
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_3D_MODE_OFF 3
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_SPIN_DIRECTION1 4
    STATE ACTUATOR_CONFIGURATION_SPIN_DIRECTION2 5

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER OUTPUT_FUNCTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Actuator Output function"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM (MAV_CMD 400)
# Arms / Disarms a component
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM BIG_ENDIAN "Arms / Disarms a component"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":400,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 400 400 400 "MAV_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ARM 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Arm (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: disarm). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER FORCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "0: arm-disarm unless prevented by safety checks (i.e. when landed), 21196: force arming/disarming (e.g. allow arming to override preflight checks and disarming in flight)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
  HAZARDOUS "Arming enables the motors - ensure area is clear!"

# ============================================================================
# RUN_PREARM_CHECKS (MAV_CMD 401)
# Instructs a target system to run pre-arm checks.
# This allows preflight checks to be run on demand, which may be useful on
# systems that normally run them at low rate, or which do not trigger checks
# when the armable state might have changed.
# This command should return MAV_RESULT_ACCEPTED if it will run the checks.
# The results of the checks are usually then reported in SYS_STATUS messages
# (this is system-specific).
# The command should return MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED if the system is
# already armed.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> RUN_PREARM_CHECKS BIG_ENDIAN "Instructs a target system to run pre-arm checks. This allows preflight checks to be run on demand, which may be useful on systems that normally run them at low rate, or which do not trigger checks when the armable state might have changed. This command should return MAV_RESULT_ACCEPTED if it will run the checks. The results of the checks are usually then reported in SYS_STATUS messages (this is system-specific). The command should return MAV_RESULT_TEMPORARILY_REJECTED if the system is already armed."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":401,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 401 401 401 "MAV_CMD_RUN_PREARM_CHECKS"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# ILLUMINATOR_ON_OFF (MAV_CMD 405)
# Turns illuminators ON/OFF. An illuminator is a light source that is used
# for lighting up dark areas external to the system: e.g. a torch or
# searchlight (as opposed to a light source for illuminating the system
# itself, e.g. an indicator light).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ILLUMINATOR_ON_OFF BIG_ENDIAN "Turns illuminators ON/OFF. An illuminator is a light source that is used for lighting up dark areas external to the system: e.g. a torch or searchlight (as opposed to a light source for illuminating the system itself, e.g. an indicator light)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor

# ============================================================================
# INJECT_FAILURE (MAV_CMD 420)
# Inject artificial failure for testing purposes. Note that autopilots
# should implement an additional protection before accepting this command
# such as a specific param setting.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> INJECT_FAILURE BIG_ENDIAN "Inject artificial failure for testing purposes. Note that autopilots should implement an additional protection before accepting this command such as a specific param setting."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":420,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 420 420 420 "MAV_CMD_INJECT_FAILURE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER FAILURE_UNIT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The unit which is affected by the failure."
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_GYRO 0
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_ACCEL 1
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_MAG 2
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_BARO 3
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_GPS 4
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_OPTICAL_FLOW 5
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_VIO 6
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_DISTANCE_SENSOR 7
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SENSOR_AIRSPEED 8
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_BATTERY 100
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_MOTOR 101
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_SERVO 102
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_AVOIDANCE 103
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_RC_SIGNAL 104
    STATE FAILURE_UNIT_SYSTEM_MAVLINK_SIGNAL 105

  APPEND_PARAMETER FAILURE_TYPE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The type how the failure manifests itself."
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_OK 0
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_OFF 1
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_STUCK 2
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_GARBAGE 3
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_WRONG 4
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_SLOW 5
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_DELAYED 6
    STATE FAILURE_TYPE_INTERMITTENT 7

  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Instance affected by failure (0 to signal all)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL (MAV_CMD 511)
# Set the interval between messages for a particular MAVLink message ID.
# This interface replaces REQUEST_DATA_STREAM.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL BIG_ENDIAN "Set the interval between messages for a particular MAVLink message ID. This interface replaces REQUEST_DATA_STREAM."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":511,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 511 511 511 "MAV_CMD_SET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MESSAGE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The MAVLink message ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER INTERVAL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The interval between two messages. -1: disable. 0: request default rate (which may be zero)."
    UNITS "Microseconds" us

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Use for index ID, if required. Otherwise, the use of this parameter (if any) must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0). When used as an index ID, 0 means 'all instances', '1' means the first instance in the sequence (the emitted message will have an id of 0 if message ids are 0-indexed, or 1 if index numbers start from one)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0/NaN)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0/NaN)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RESPONSE_TARGET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target address of message stream (if message has target address fields). 0: Flight-stack default (recommended), 1: address of requester, 2: broadcast."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# REQUEST_MESSAGE (MAV_CMD 512)
# Request the target system(s) emit a single instance of a specified message
# (i.e. a "one-shot" version of MAV_CMD_SET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL).
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> REQUEST_MESSAGE BIG_ENDIAN "Request the target system(s) emit a single instance of a specified message (i.e. a 'one-shot' version of MAV_CMD_SET_MESSAGE_INTERVAL)."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":512,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 512 512 512 "MAV_CMD_REQUEST_MESSAGE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER MESSAGE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The MAVLink message ID of the requested message."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Use for index ID, if required. Otherwise, the use of this parameter (if any) must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REQ_PARAM_5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The use of this parameter (if any), must be defined in the requested message. By default assumed not used (0)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RESPONSE_TARGET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target address for requested message (if message has target address fields). 0: Flight-stack default, 1: address of requester, 2: broadcast."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# REQUEST_PROTOCOL_VERSION (MAV_CMD 519)
# Request MAVLink protocol version compatibility. All receivers should ACK
# the command and then emit their capabilities in an PROTOCOL_VERSION
# message
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> REQUEST_PROTOCOL_VERSION BIG_ENDIAN "Request MAVLink protocol version compatibility. All receivers should ACK the command and then emit their capabilities in an PROTOCOL_VERSION message"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":519,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 519 519 519 "MAV_CMD_REQUEST_PROTOCOL_VERSION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PROTOCOL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Request supported protocol versions by all nodes on the network (MAV_BOOL_TRUE). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (all remaining params)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# REQUEST_AUTOPILOT_CAPABILITIES (MAV_CMD 520)
# Request autopilot capabilities. The receiver should ACK the command and
# then emit its capabilities in an AUTOPILOT_VERSION message
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> REQUEST_AUTOPILOT_CAPABILITIES BIG_ENDIAN "Request autopilot capabilities. The receiver should ACK the command and then emit its capabilities in an AUTOPILOT_VERSION message"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":520,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'

# SET_CAMERA_MODE (MAV_CMD 530)

  APPEND_PARAMETER CAMERA_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Camera mode"
    STATE CAMERA_MODE_IMAGE 0
    STATE CAMERA_MODE_VIDEO 1

# ============================================================================
# SET_STORAGE_USAGE (MAV_CMD 533)
# Set that a particular storage is the preferred location for saving photos,
# videos, and/or other media (e.g. to set that an SD card is used for
# storing videos).
# There can only be one preferred save location for each particular media
# type: setting a media usage flag will clear/reset that same flag if set on
# any other storage.
# If no flag is set the system should use its default storage.
# A target system can choose to always use default storage, in which case it
# should ACK the command with MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED.
# A target system can choose to not allow a particular storage to be set as
# preferred storage, in which case it should ACK the command with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_STORAGE_USAGE BIG_ENDIAN "Set that a particular storage is the preferred location for saving photos, videos, and/or other media (e.g. to set that an SD card is used for storing videos). There can only be one preferred save location for each particular media type: setting a media usage flag will clear/reset that same flag if set on any other storage. If no flag is set the system should use its default storage. A target system can choose to always use default storage, in which case it should ACK the command with MAV_RESULT_UNSUPPORTED. A target system can choose to not allow a particular storage to be set as preferred storage, in which case it should ACK the command with MAV_RESULT_DENIED."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":533,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 533 533 533 "MAV_CMD_SET_STORAGE_USAGE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER STORAGE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Storage ID (1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER USAGE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Usage flags"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_CAMERA_SOURCE (MAV_CMD 534)
# Set camera source. Changes the camera's active sources on cameras with
# multiple image sensors.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_CAMERA_SOURCE BIG_ENDIAN "Set camera source. Changes the camera's active sources on cameras with multiple image sensors."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":534,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 534 534 534 "MAV_CMD_SET_CAMERA_SOURCE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Component Id of camera to address or 1-6 for non-MAVLink cameras, 0 for all cameras."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PRIMARY_SOURCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Primary Source"
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_DEFAULT 0
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_RGB 1
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_IR 2
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_NDVI 3

  APPEND_PARAMETER SECONDARY_SOURCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Secondary Source. If non-zero the second source will be displayed as picture-in-picture."
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_DEFAULT 0
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_RGB 1
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_IR 2
    STATE CAMERA_SOURCE_NDVI 3

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_JUMP_TAG (MAV_CMD 601)
# Jump to the matching tag in the mission list. Repeat this action for the
# specified number of times. A mission should contain a single matching tag
# for each jump. If this is not the case then a jump to a missing tag should
# complete the mission, and a jump where there are multiple matching tags
# should always select the one with the lowest mission sequence number.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_JUMP_TAG BIG_ENDIAN "Jump to the matching tag in the mission list. Repeat this action for the specified number of times. A mission should contain a single matching tag for each jump. If this is not the case then a jump to a missing tag should complete the mission, and a jump where there are multiple matching tags should always select the one with the lowest mission sequence number."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":601,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 601 601 601 "MAV_CMD_DO_JUMP_TAG"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TAG 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target tag to jump to."

  APPEND_PARAMETER REPEAT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Repeat count."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW (MAV_CMD 1000)
# Set gimbal manager pitch/yaw setpoints (low rate command). It is possible
# to set combinations of the values below. E.g. an angle as well as a
# desired angular rate can be used to get to this angle at a certain angular
# rate, or an angular rate only will result in continuous turning. NaN is to
# be used to signal unset. Note: only the gimbal manager will react to this
# command - it will be ignored by a gimbal device. Use
# GIMBAL_MANAGER_SET_PITCHYAW if you need to stream pitch/yaw setpoints at
# higher rate.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW BIG_ENDIAN "Set gimbal manager pitch/yaw setpoints (low rate command). It is possible to set combinations of the values below. E.g. an angle as well as a desired angular rate can be used to get to this angle at a certain angular rate, or an angular rate only will result in continuous turning. NaN is to be used to signal unset. Note: only the gimbal manager will react to this command - it will be ignored by a gimbal device. Use GIMBAL_MANAGER_SET_PITCHYAW if you need to stream pitch/yaw setpoints at higher rate."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":1000,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 1000 1000 1000 "MAV_CMD_DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_PITCHYAW"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pitch angle (positive to pitch up, relative to vehicle for FOLLOW mode, relative to world horizon for LOCK mode)."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw angle (positive to yaw to the right, relative to vehicle for FOLLOW mode, absolute to North for LOCK mode)."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER PITCH_RATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Pitch rate (positive to pitch up)."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW_RATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw rate (positive to yaw to the right)."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_MANAGER_FLAGS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Gimbal manager flags to use."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 for all gimbal device components. Send command multiple times for more than one gimbal (but not all gimbals)."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE (MAV_CMD 1001)
# Gimbal configuration to set which sysid/compid is in primary and secondary
# control.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE BIG_ENDIAN "Gimbal configuration to set which sysid/compid is in primary and secondary control."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":1001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 1001 1001 1001 "MAV_CMD_DO_GIMBAL_MANAGER_CONFIGURE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSID_PRIMARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Sysid for primary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: set itself in control (for missions where the own sysid is still unknown), -3: remove control if currently in control)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPID_PRIMARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Compid for primary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: set itself in control (for missions where the own sysid is still unknown), -3: remove control if currently in control)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSID_SECONDARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Sysid for secondary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: set itself in control (for missions where the own sysid is still unknown), -3: remove control if currently in control)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPID_SECONDARY_CONTROL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Compid for secondary control (0: no one in control, -1: leave unchanged, -2: set itself in control (for missions where the own sysid is still unknown), -3: remove control if currently in control)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER GIMBAL_DEVICE_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Component ID of gimbal device to address (or 1-6 for non-MAVLink gimbal), 0 for all gimbal device components. Send command multiple times for more than one gimbal (but not all gimbals)."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# IMAGE_START_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2000)
# Start image capture sequence. CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED must be emitted after
# each capture.
# Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to
# 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID.
# It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the
# autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which
# have a distinct MAVLink component ID).
# It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions.
# When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a
# specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is
# intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's
# target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to
# zero).
# If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both.
# When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using
# target_component.
# If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the
# same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist).
# If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param 1 can be used to address all
# cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other
# values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be
# set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An
# autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all
# channels.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> IMAGE_START_CAPTURE BIG_ENDIAN "Start image capture sequence. CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED must be emitted after each capture. Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID. It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which have a distinct MAVLink component ID). It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions. When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to zero). If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both. When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using target_component. If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist). If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param 1 can be used to address all cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED. If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all channels."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2000,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2000 2000 2000 "MAV_CMD_IMAGE_START_CAPTURE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission."

  APPEND_PARAMETER INTERVAL 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired elapsed time between two consecutive pictures (in seconds). Minimum values depend on hardware (typically greater than 2 seconds)."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER TOTAL_IMAGES 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Total number of images to capture. 0 to capture forever/until MAV_CMD_IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE."

  APPEND_PARAMETER SEQUENCE_NUMBER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Capture sequence number starting from 1. This is only valid for single-capture (param3 == 1), otherwise set to 0. Increment the capture ID for each capture command to prevent double captures when a command is re-transmitted."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE (MAV_CMD 2001)
# Stop image capture sequence.
# Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to
# 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID.
# It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the
# autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which
# have a distinct MAVLink component ID).
# It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions.
# When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a
# specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is
# intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's
# target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to
# zero).
# If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both.
# When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using
# target_component.
# If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the
# same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with
# MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist).
# If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param1 can be used to address all
# cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other
# values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED.
# If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be
# set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An
# autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all
# channels.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE BIG_ENDIAN "Stop image capture sequence. Param1 (id) may be used to specify the target camera: 0: all cameras, 1 to 6: autopilot-connected cameras, 7-255: MAVLink camera component ID. It is needed in order to target specific cameras connected to the autopilot, or specific sensors in a multi-sensor camera (neither of which have a distinct MAVLink component ID). It is also needed to specify the target camera in missions. When used in a mission, an autopilot should execute the MAV_CMD for a specified local camera (param1 = 1-6), or resend it as a command if it is intended for a MAVLink camera (param1 = 7 - 255), setting the command's target_component as the param1 value (and setting param1 in the command to zero). If the param1 is 0 the autopilot should do both. When sent in a command the target MAVLink address is set using target_component. If addressed specifically to an autopilot: param1 should be used in the same way as it is for missions (though command should NACK with MAV_RESULT_DENIED if a specified local camera does not exist). If addressed to a MAVLink camera, param1 can be used to address all cameras (0), or to separately address 1 to 7 individual sensors. Other values should be NACKed with MAV_RESULT_DENIED. If the command is broadcast (target_component is 0) then param 1 should be set to 0 (any other value should be NACKED with MAV_RESULT_DENIED). An autopilot would trigger any local cameras and forward the command to all channels."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2001 2001 2001 "MAV_CMD_IMAGE_STOP_CAPTURE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER NUMBER 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Sequence number for missing CAMERA_IMAGE_CAPTURED message"

# ============================================================================
# DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL (MAV_CMD 2003)
# Enable or disable on-board camera triggering system.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL BIG_ENDIAN "Enable or disable on-board camera triggering system."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2003,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2003 2003 2003 "MAV_CMD_DO_TRIGGER_CONTROL"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Trigger enable/disable (0 for disable, 1 for start), -1 to ignore"

  APPEND_PARAMETER RESET 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1 to reset the trigger sequence, -1 or 0 to ignore"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PAUSE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "1 to pause triggering, but without switching the camera off or retracting it. -1 to ignore"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAMERA_TRACK_POINT (MAV_CMD 2004)
# If the camera supports point visual tracking
# (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_POINT is set), this command allows to
# initiate the tracking.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAMERA_TRACK_POINT BIG_ENDIAN "If the camera supports point visual tracking (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_POINT is set), this command allows to initiate the tracking."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2004,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2004 2004 2004 "MAV_CMD_CAMERA_TRACK_POINT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER POINT_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Point to track x value (normalized 0..1, 0 is left, 1 is right)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER POINT_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Point to track y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bottom)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Point radius (normalized 0..1, 0 is one pixel, 1 is full image width)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras. This is used to target specific autopilot-connected cameras. It is also used to target specific cameras when the MAV_CMD is used in a mission."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAMERA_TRACK_RECTANGLE (MAV_CMD 2005)
# If the camera supports rectangle visual tracking
# (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_RECTANGLE is set), this command allows to
# initiate the tracking.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAMERA_TRACK_RECTANGLE BIG_ENDIAN "If the camera supports rectangle visual tracking (CAMERA_CAP_FLAGS_HAS_TRACKING_RECTANGLE is set), this command allows to initiate the tracking."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2005,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2005 2005 2005 "MAV_CMD_CAMERA_TRACK_RECTANGLE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TOP_LEFT_CORNER_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Top left corner of rectangle x value (normalized 0..1, 0 is left, 1 is right)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TOP_LEFT_CORNER_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Top left corner of rectangle y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bottom)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER BOTTOM_RIGHT_CORNER_X 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Bottom right corner of rectangle x value (normalized 0..1, 0 is left, 1 is right)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER BOTTOM_RIGHT_CORNER_Y 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Bottom right corner of rectangle y value (normalized 0..1, 0 is top, 1 is bottom)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_CAMERA_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target camera ID. 7 to 255: MAVLink camera component id. 1 to 6 for cameras attached to the autopilot, which don't have a distinct component id. 0: all cameras.   APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CONTROL_HIGH_LATENCY (MAV_CMD 2600)
# Request to start/stop transmitting over the high latency telemetry
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CONTROL_HIGH_LATENCY BIG_ENDIAN "Request to start/stop transmitting over the high latency telemetry"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2600,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2600 2600 2600 "MAV_CMD_CONTROL_HIGH_LATENCY"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ENABLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Start transmission over high latency telemetry (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: stop transmission). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PANORAMA_CREATE (MAV_CMD 2800)
# Create a panorama at the current position
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PANORAMA_CREATE BIG_ENDIAN "Create a panorama at the current position"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":2800,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 2800 2800 2800 "MAV_CMD_PANORAMA_CREATE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER HORIZONTAL_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Viewing angle horizontal of the panorama (+- 0.5 the total angle)"
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTICAL_ANGLE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Viewing angle vertical of panorama."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER HORIZONTAL_SPEED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Speed of the horizontal rotation."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTICAL_SPEED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Speed of the vertical rotation."
    UNITS "Degrees_per_second" deg/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_VTOL_TRANSITION (MAV_CMD 3000)
# Request VTOL transition
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_VTOL_TRANSITION BIG_ENDIAN "Request VTOL transition"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":3000,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 3000 3000 3000 "MAV_CMD_DO_VTOL_TRANSITION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER STATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The target VTOL state. For normal transitions, only MAV_VTOL_STATE_MC and MAV_VTOL_STATE_FW can be used."
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_UNDEFINED 0
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_TRANSITION_TO_FW 1
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_TRANSITION_TO_MC 2
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_MC 3
    STATE MAV_VTOL_STATE_FW 4

  APPEND_PARAMETER IMMEDIATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Force immediate transition to the specified MAV_VTOL_STATE. 1: Force immediate, 0: normal transition. Can be used, for example, to trigger an emergency 'Quadchute'. Caution: Can be dangerous/damage vehicle, depending on autopilot implementation of this command."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST (MAV_CMD 3001)
# Request authorization to arm the vehicle to a external entity, the arm
# authorizer is responsible to request all data that is needs from the
# vehicle before authorize or deny the request.
# If approved the COMMAND_ACK message progress field should be set with
# period of time that this authorization is valid in seconds.
# If the authorization is denied COMMAND_ACK.result_param2 should be set
# with one of the reasons in ARM_AUTH_DENIED_REASON.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST BIG_ENDIAN "Request authorization to arm the vehicle to a external entity, the arm authorizer is responsible to request all data that is needs from the vehicle before authorize or deny the request. If approved the COMMAND_ACK message progress field should be set with period of time that this authorization is valid in seconds. If the authorization is denied COMMAND_ACK.result_param2 should be set with one of the reasons in ARM_AUTH_DENIED_REASON."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":3001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 3001 3001 3001 "MAV_CMD_ARM_AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER SYSTEM_ID 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Vehicle system id, this way ground station can request arm authorization on behalf of any vehicle"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_STANDARD (MAV_CMD 4000)
# This command sets the submode to standard guided when vehicle is in guided
# mode. The vehicle holds position and altitude and the user can input the
# desired velocities along all three axes.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_STANDARD BIG_ENDIAN "This command sets the submode to standard guided when vehicle is in guided mode. The vehicle holds position and altitude and the user can input the desired velocities along all three axes."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":4000,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

# ============================================================================
# SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE (MAV_CMD 4001)
# This command sets submode circle when vehicle is in guided mode. Vehicle
# flies along a circle facing the center of the circle. The user can input
# the velocity along the circle and change the radius. If no input is given
# the vehicle will hold position.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE BIG_ENDIAN "This command sets submode circle when vehicle is in guided mode. Vehicle flies along a circle facing the center of the circle. The user can input the velocity along the circle and change the radius. If no input is given the vehicle will hold position."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":4001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 4001 4001 4001 "MAV_CMD_SET_GUIDED_SUBMODE_CIRCLE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER RADIUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Radius of desired circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target latitude of center of circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Target longitude of center of circle in CIRCLE_MODE"
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"
    HIDDEN

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":4501,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 4501 4501 4501 "MAV_CMD_CONDITION_GATE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER GEOMETRY 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Geometry: 0: orthogonal to path between previous and next waypoint."

  APPEND_PARAMETER USEALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Use altitude (MAV_BOOL_FALSE: ignore altitude). Values not equal to 0 or 1 are invalid."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION (MAV_CMD 5001)
# Fence vertex for an inclusion polygon (the polygon must not be
# self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay within this area. Minimum of 3
# vertices required.
# The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set
# to the total number of vertices in the polygon.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION BIG_ENDIAN "Fence vertex for an inclusion polygon (the polygon must not be self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay within this area. Minimum of 3 vertices required. The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set to the total number of vertices in the polygon."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":5001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5001 5001 5001 "MAV_CMD_NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_INCLUSION"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER VERTEX_COUNT 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Polygon vertex count. This is the number of vertices in the current polygon (all vertices will have the same number)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER INCLUSION_GROUP 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Vehicle must be inside ALL inclusion zones in a single group, vehicle must be inside at least one group, must be the same for all points in each polygon"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_EXCLUSION (MAV_CMD 5002)
# Fence vertex for an exclusion polygon (the polygon must not be
# self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay outside this area. Minimum of 3
# vertices required.
# The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set
# to the total number of vertices in the polygon.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> NAV_FENCE_POLYGON_VERTEX_EXCLUSION BIG_ENDIAN "Fence vertex for an exclusion polygon (the polygon must not be self-intersecting). The vehicle must stay outside this area. Minimum of 3 vertices required. The vertices for a polygon must be sent sequentially, each with param1 set to the total number of vertices in the polygon."

  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

# ============================================================================
# UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO (MAV_CMD 5200)
# Commands the vehicle to respond with a sequence of messages
# UAVCAN_NODE_INFO, one message per every UAVCAN node that is online. Note
# that some of the response messages can be lost, which the receiver can
# detect easily by checking whether every received UAVCAN_NODE_STATUS has a
# matching message UAVCAN_NODE_INFO received earlier; if not, this command
# should be sent again in order to request re-transmission of the node
# information messages.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO BIG_ENDIAN "Commands the vehicle to respond with a sequence of messages UAVCAN_NODE_INFO, one message per every UAVCAN node that is online. Note that some of the response messages can be lost, which the receiver can detect easily by checking whether every received UAVCAN_NODE_STATUS has a matching message UAVCAN_NODE_INFO received earlier; if not, this command should be sent again in order to request re-transmission of the node information messages."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":5200,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 5200 5200 5200 "MAV_CMD_UAVCAN_GET_NODE_INFO"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":5300,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'

    STATE SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE_SAFE 0
    STATE SAFETY_SWITCH_STATE_DANGEROUS 1
