# ============================================================================
# DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT (MAV_CMD 10001)
# Trigger the start of an ADSB-out IDENT. This should only be used when
# requested to do so by an Air Traffic Controller in controlled airspace.
# This starts the IDENT which is then typically held for 18 seconds by the
# hardware per the Mode A, C, and S transponder spec.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT BIG_ENDIAN "Trigger the start of an ADSB-out IDENT. This should only be used when requested to do so by an Air Traffic Controller in controlled airspace. This starts the IDENT which is then typically held for 18 seconds by the hardware per the Mode A, C, and S transponder spec."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":10001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 10001 10001 10001 "MAV_CMD_DO_ADSB_OUT_IDENT"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved (set to 0)"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY (MAV_CMD 30001)
# Deploy payload on a Lat / Lon / Alt position. This includes the navigation
# to reach the required release position and velocity.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY BIG_ENDIAN "Deploy payload on a Lat / Lon / Alt position. This includes the navigation to reach the required release position and velocity."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":30001,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 30001 30001 30001 "MAV_CMD_PAYLOAD_PREPARE_DEPLOY"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER OPERATION_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Operation mode. 0: prepare single payload deploy (overwriting previous requests), but do not execute it. 1: execute payload deploy immediately (rejecting further deploy commands during execution, but allowing abort). 2: add payload deploy to existing deployment list."

  APPEND_PARAMETER APPROACH_VECTOR 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired approach vector in compass heading. A negative value indicates the system can define the approach vector at will."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER GROUND_SPEED 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Desired ground speed at release time. This can be overridden by the airframe in case it needs to meet minimum airspeed. A negative value indicates the system can define the ground speed at will."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE_CLEARANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Minimum altitude clearance to the release position. A negative value indicates the system can define the clearance at will."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude."
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude."
    UNITS "Degrees_E7" degE7

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

  APPEND_PARAMETER OPERATION_MODE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Operation mode. 0: Abort deployment, continue normal mission. 1: switch to payload deployment mode. 100: delete first payload deployment request. 101: delete all payload deployment requests."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Reserved"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude unscaled"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude (MSL)"
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# USER_1 (MAV_CMD 31010)
# User defined command. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as flying
# through this item. Example: MAV_CMD_DO_SET_PARAMETER item.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> USER_1 BIG_ENDIAN "User defined command. Ground Station will not show the Vehicle as flying through this item. Example: MAV_CMD_DO_SET_PARAMETER item."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":31010,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 31010 31010 31010 "MAV_CMD_USER_1"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM1 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "User defined"

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# CAN_FORWARD (MAV_CMD 32000)
# Request forwarding of CAN packets from the given CAN bus to this
# component. CAN Frames are sent using CAN_FRAME and CANFD_FRAME messages
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> CAN_FORWARD BIG_ENDIAN "Request forwarding of CAN packets from the given CAN bus to this component. CAN Frames are sent using CAN_FRAME and CANFD_FRAME messages"
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":32000,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 32000 32000 32000 "MAV_CMD_CAN_FORWARD"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER BUS 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Bus number (0 to disable forwarding, 1 for first bus, 2 for 2nd bus, 3 for 3rd bus)."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM2 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM3 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW (MAV_CMD 42006)
# Magnetometer calibration based on provided known yaw. This allows for fast
# calibration using WMM field tables in the vehicle, given only the known
# yaw of the vehicle. If Latitude and longitude are both zero then use the
# current vehicle location.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW BIG_ENDIAN "Magnetometer calibration based on provided known yaw. This allows for fast calibration using WMM field tables in the vehicle, given only the known yaw of the vehicle. If Latitude and longitude are both zero then use the current vehicle location."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":42006,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 42006 42006 42006 "MAV_CMD_FIXED_MAG_CAL_YAW"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER YAW 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Yaw of vehicle in earth frame."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMPASSMASK 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "CompassMask, 0 for all."

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude."
    UNITS "Degrees" deg

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# DO_WINCH (MAV_CMD 42600)
# Command to operate winch.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> DO_WINCH BIG_ENDIAN "Command to operate winch."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":42600,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 42600 42600 42600 "MAV_CMD_DO_WINCH"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER INSTANCE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Winch instance number."

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACTION 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Action to perform."
    STATE WINCH_RELAXED 0
    STATE WINCH_RELATIVE_LENGTH_CONTROL 1
    STATE WINCH_RATE_CONTROL 2
    STATE WINCH_LOCK 3
    STATE WINCH_DELIVER 4
    STATE WINCH_HOLD 5
    STATE WINCH_RETRACT 6
    STATE WINCH_LOAD_LINE 7
    STATE WINCH_ABANDON_LINE 8
    STATE WINCH_LOAD_PAYLOAD 9

  APPEND_PARAMETER LENGTH 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Length of line to release (negative to wind)."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  APPEND_PARAMETER RATE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Release rate (negative to wind)."
    UNITS "Meters_per_second" m/s

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM5 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM6 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM7 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty."

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK

# ============================================================================
# EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE (MAV_CMD 43003)
# Provide an external position estimate for use when dead-reckoning. This is
# meant to be used for occasional position resets that may be provided by a
# external system such as a remote pilot using landmarks over a video link.
# ============================================================================
COMMAND <%= target_name %> EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE BIG_ENDIAN "Provide an external position estimate for use when dead-reckoning. This is meant to be used for occasional position resets that may be provided by a external system such as a remote pilot using landmarks over a video link."
  ACCESSOR JsonAccessor
  TEMPLATE '{"MSGNAME":"COMMAND_LONG","target_system":1,"target_component":1,"command":43003,"confirmation":0,"param1":0.0,"param2":0.0,"param3":0.0,"param4":0.0,"param5":0.0,"param6":0.0,"param7":0.0}'
  # Sent as JSON - converted to MAVLink COMMAND_LONG by protocol

  APPEND_PARAMETER MSGNAME 0 STRING "COMMAND_LONG" "Message type"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_SYSTEM 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target system ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TARGET_COMPONENT 8 UINT 1 0 255 "Target component ID"

  APPEND_PARAMETER COMMAND 16 UINT 43003 43003 43003 "MAV_CMD_EXTERNAL_POSITION_ESTIMATE"

  APPEND_PARAMETER CONFIRMATION 8 UINT 0 0 255 "0=First transmission, increment for retries"

  APPEND_PARAMETER TRANSMISSION_TIME 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Timestamp that this message was sent as a time in the transmitters time domain. The sender should wrap this time back to zero based on required timing accuracy for the application and the limitations of a 32 bit float. For example, wrapping at 10 hours would give approximately 1ms accuracy. Recipient must handle time wrap in any timing jitter correction applied to this field. Wrap rollover time should not be at not more than 250 seconds, which would give approximately 10 microsecond accuracy."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER PROCESSING_TIME 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "The time spent in processing the sensor data that is the basis for this position. The recipient can use this to improve time alignment of the data. Set to zero if not known."
    UNITS "Seconds" s

  APPEND_PARAMETER ACCURACY 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "estimated one standard deviation accuracy of the measurement. Set to NaN if not known."

  APPEND_PARAMETER PARAM4 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Empty"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LATITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Latitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER LONGITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Longitude"

  APPEND_PARAMETER ALTITUDE 32 FLOAT 0.0 MIN MAX "Altitude, not used. Should be sent as NaN. May be supported in a future version of this message."
    UNITS "Meters" m

  RESPONSE <%= target_name %> COMMAND_ACK
